definition: developer (of real estate, a commercial product etc)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但開發商不願爲低收入家庭建造低利潤的單元房。

sentences.english: The developer is under the family, is responsible for land which digests encircles .
sentences.chinese: 開發商是“下家”，負責消化圈來的土地。

sentences.english: The developer claims that this game has been a top-seller on wireless and on retail platforms.
sentences.chinese: 開發商聲稱，這場比賽已頂級無線和賣方的零售平臺。

sentences.english: For developers, there is no evidence of property rights will not be able to bank loans.
sentences.chinese: 對於開發商來說，沒有產權證就無法向銀行貸款。

sentences.english: It is an alternative for the investors to develop residential areas in the metropolitan fringe.
sentences.chinese: 大都市邊緣區住宅開發是大多數開發商的可能選擇。

sentences.english: Because of good land has been strong in the pre-developer "carve up" the.
sentences.chinese: 由於良好的土地已被強大的前開發商“瓜分”了。

sentences.english: Also, the developer will offer another ten percent mortgage to purchasers.
sentences.chinese: 開發商可提供一成的按揭給認購者。

sentences.english: The two south and the north of the developers really commendable development.
sentences.chinese: 上述一南一北兩個樓盤的開發商確實值得稱道。

sentences.english: Her persistence and enthusiasm have helped the group to achieve its status as an international development agency.
sentences.chinese: 她的執著和熱情幫助集團贏得了國際開發商的地位。

sentences.english: Many luxury property developers such as Greentown have been hit.
sentences.chinese: 包括綠城在內，很多高端房地產開發商都受到了衝擊。

sentences.english: Statistics like these make China's property developers drool.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的數字讓中國的房地產開發商垂涎。

sentences.english: But the developers also fell prey to one-upmanship.
sentences.chinese: 但是開發商也失去了高人一等的作風。

sentences.english: Only proffesional developers with experience and former good reviews.
sentences.chinese: 隨着經驗和良好的評語只有前業餘體校開發商。

sentences.english: Most often, however, all of this work is done in-house by the developer.
sentences.chinese: 但是最常見的還是由開發商本身完成所有這些工作。

sentences.english: Loans to property developers account for another 8% or so, according to Mr Rothman.
sentences.chinese: 銀行對開發商的貸款比例還不到8%，羅斯曼先生稱。

sentences.english: The real estate developer compensated the local residents for the cost of moving.
sentences.chinese: 房地產開發商付給當地居民拆遷費。
